bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with shi zhu 屍疰 , corpse [qi] attachment-illness. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 1: 屍 注、鬼注病者…不的知其所苦，而無處不惡，累年積月，漸就頓滯，以 至於死，死後復傳之旁人，乃至滅門 , “Patients suffering from corpse [qi] influx , and demon influx…have no idea why they suffer but they feel bad all over. This may continue for months or years…eventually they die. After they have died [the disease] is transmitted to a bystander until the entire family has perished”.
